title: Reaction Speed

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Slow. Their action is delayed by a night. They will be informed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, you roleblock all players who attempt to visit you, and you gain RB and control immunity. If you kill a player whose ability was delayed last night, you Slow two random non-Psychopathic players.
- Delayed actions happen with the lowest priority. (For example, if a vigilante's shot gets delayed and they only have 1 shot left, then tomorrow night if they decide to shoot someone, their delayed shot will not happen since they have 0 charges left.)
- Delayed abilities cannot be further delayed.
Kill Note Addition:
*"I didn't plan to kill them. It just happened so fast, the world seemed to spin around me."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4958
*Be quick to react. Dodge bullets and fists.*
